import re

df1 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_14.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
matching_regex = r"Yhteensä Yhteensä (\d.*) Väestö 31.12."

for column in df1.columns:
    matchy = re.match(matching_regex, column)
    if matchy:
        #print(f"Rename column '{column}' to column '{matchy.groups()[0]}'")
        df1 = df1.withColumnRenamed(column, matchy.groups()[0])
    elif column.lower() not in ["alue", "pääasiallinen toiminta"]:
        df1 = df1.drop(column)

#display(df1)

import re
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit

df1 = df1.withColumnRenamed("2014", "luku")

df1 = df1.withColumn("vuosi", lit(2014))
df1=df1.toPandas()
#display(df1)

import re

df2 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_15.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
matching_regex_df2 = r"Yhteensä Yhteensä (\d.*) Väestö 31.12."

for column in df2.columns:
    matchi = re.match(matching_regex_df2, column)
    if matchi:
        #print(f"Rename column '{column}' to column '{matchi.groups()[0]}'")
        df2 = df2.withColumnRenamed(column, matchi.groups()[0])
    elif column.lower() not in ["alue", "pääasiallinen toiminta"]:
        df2 = df2.drop(column)

#display(df2)

import pandas as pd

df_pd2 = df2.toPandas()
df_melted2 = pd.melt(df_pd2, id_vars=['Alue', 'Pääasiallinen toiminta'], var_name='vuosi', value_name='luku')

import re

df3 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_18.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
matching_regex_df3 = r"Yhteensä Yhteensä (\d.*) Väestö 31.12."

for column in df3.columns:
    matchi = re.match(matching_regex_df3, column)
    if matchi:
        print(f"Rename column '{column}' to column '{matchi.groups()[0]}'")
        df3 = df3.withColumnRenamed(column, matchi.groups()[0])
    elif column.lower() not in ["alue", "pääasiallinen toiminta"]:
        df3 = df3.drop(column)

#display(df3)

import pandas as pd

df_pd3 = df3.toPandas()
df_melted3 = pd.melt(df_pd3, id_vars=['Alue', 'Pääasiallinen toiminta'], var_name='vuosi', value_name='luku')

import re

df4 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_21.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
matching_regex_df4 = r"Yhteensä Yhteensä (\d.*) Väestö 31.12."

for column in df4.columns:
    matchi = re.match(matching_regex_df4, column)
    if matchi:
        print(f"Rename column '{column}' to column '{matchi.groups()[0]}'")
        df4 = df4.withColumnRenamed(column, matchi.groups()[0])
    elif column.lower() not in ["alue", "pääasiallinen toiminta"]:
        df4 = df4.drop(column)

#display(df4)

import pandas as pd

df_pd4 = df4.toPandas()
df_melted4 = pd.melt(df_pd4, id_vars=['Alue', 'Pääasiallinen toiminta'], var_name='vuosi', value_name='luku')

import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql.functions import col

combined_df = pd.concat([df1, df_melted2, df_melted3, df_melted4], ignore_index=True) 
# Get the distinct values of the 'year' column
distinct_years = combined_df['vuosi'].unique()

#Convert the Pandas DataFrame to a Spark DataFrame
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(combined_df)

spark_df.printSchema()

# Convert 'yhteensa' to int (from long)
spark_df = spark_df.withColumn('luku', col('luku').cast('int'))

# Convert 'vuosi' to int (from string)
spark_df = spark_df.withColumn('vuosi', col('vuosi').cast('int'))

# Check the schema after the changes
spark_df.printSchema()

# Get distinct values from the 'vuosi' column
distinct_vuosi = spark_df.select('vuosi').distinct().collect()

# Convert the result into a list of values
distinct_vuosi_values = [row['vuosi'] for row in distinct_vuosi]

# Display the distinct values
print(distinct_vuosi_values)

spark_df = spark_df.withColumnRenamed("Alue", "kunta")
spark_df = spark_df.withColumnRenamed("Pääasiallinen toiminta", "joukko")

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

df_pivoted = spark_df.groupBy("kunta", "vuosi").pivot("joukko").agg(F.first("luku"))

# Order the DataFrame alphabetically by 'kunta'
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted.orderBy("kunta", "vuosi")

# Display the result
display(df_pivoted_ordered)

df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Eläkeläiset", "elakelaiset")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Muut työvoiman ulkopuolella olevat", "muut_tyovoiman_ulkopuolella_olevat")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Opiskelijat, koululaiset", "opiskelijat")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Työlliset", "tyolliset")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Työttömät", "tyottomat")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("0-14 -vuotiaat", "0_14_vuotiaat")

df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Työvoima", "tyovoima")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Työvoiman ulkopuolella olevat", "tyovoiman_ulkopuolella_olevat")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Varusmiehet, siviilipalvelusmiehet", "varsiviilimiehet")
df_pivoted_ordered = df_pivoted_ordered.withColumnRenamed("Yhteensä", "vakiluku")

display(df_pivoted_ordered)

for column in df_pivoted_ordered.columns:
    print(column)
    # Check the schema after the changes
df_pivoted_ordered.printSchema()

# Define output path
output_path = "abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/population/population_data.parquet"

# Save DataFrame as Parquet
df_pivoted_ordered.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)

print("Data successfully saved to ADLS in Parquet format.")
